channel.title: Whats wrong with this code?

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

Add it in your npchandler.java

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1575) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.sendMessage("Sendmessage if you want."); ppl.teleportToX = coordsX; ppl.teleportToY = coordsY; }
Add it above the barrow drops and if u dont got that add under kbd drop =]
